coreAttributes.name: Hoplite Shield
coreAttributes.description: The hoplite shield, or aspis (although it is commonly called a 'hoplon'), was heavy, weighing about 30 pounds. They were constructed out of wood with an outer layer of bronze. Due to its defensive nature, using it as a weapon could gain the advantage of surprise..
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of [npc.her] Hoplite, and [npc.verb(prepare)] to use it to defend [npc.herself] in combat.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Swinging [npc.her] Hoplite, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to whack [npc2.name] on the [npc2.arm], which causes [npc2.herHim] to let out a surprised yelp!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Hoplite, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to land a solid hit on [npc2.her] [npc2.arm]!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(lunge)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Hoplite, whacking the boss against [npc2.her] shoulder!

missDescriptions.missText: Thrusting out with [npc.her] buckler, [npc.name] [npc.verb(attempt)] to whack [npc2.name] on the [npc2.arm], but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] buckler, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(lunge)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] buckler, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
